document_data.name: Vigdas Miller
document_data.mainbody: '''Vigdas Miller''' was a widow miller living near [[Hillsfar]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Shackles of Blood|10}}
document_data.History:
Vigdas lived with her husband, a miller, until he died ''circa'' [[1484 DR]].

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], she saw [[Red Plumes]] in the [[Tinfellow Farm]] one night the day after the [[halfling]] family had disappeared.
document_data.Relationship: Vigdas was friends with her neighbors the [[Tinfellow]] family.
